value:
$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Heiðr is...my sister. We've always
been together...$k$pHer light has guided me through
the dark so many times...$k$pAnd I...I wanted to do the same
for her.$k$p$EFace_Blush2|*sniff* Please forgive me... It isn't
proper for a goddess to lose her
composure like this...$k$p$EFace_Pain|But I...won't give up!$k$pAs long as we hold on to our hope,
there is a light to guide us.$k$pWith that light burning inside us,
we can always find a way forward...$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_シトリニカ,ch19_16_Citrinica_F_Normal,Face|I simply must train harder. There is
no other way around my lack of skill.$k$p$Sbs1000|
